jobTransform.jobTransformCmd: export VAL_SUPP=`readlink -f TriggerTest_TestConfiguration.xml | sed 's/test\/TriggerTest_TestConfiguration.xml/val_supp/'` ; valgrind --suppressions=$ROOTSYS/etc/valgrind-root.supp --track-origins=yes --trace-children=yes --suppressions=$VAL_SUPP/newSuppressions.supp --suppressions=$VAL_SUPP/oracleDB.supp --suppressions=$VAL_SUPP/valgrindRTT.supp --error-limit=no --leak-check=yes --num-callers=8 --show-reachable=yes `which athena.py` --stdcmalloc -c 'menu="DC14";checkLeak=True;jp.AthenaCommonFlags.EvtMax.set_Value_and_Lock(10);jp.Rec.OutputLevel=WARNING;LVL1OutputLevel=WARNING;HLTOutputLevel=WARNING;dsName="/eos/atlas/atlascerngroupdisk/trig-daq/validation/test_data/mc12_8TeV.105200.McAtNloJimmy_CT10_ttbar_LeptonFilter.digit.RDO.e1513_s1499_s1504_d700_tid01177880_00";fileRange=[1,20]' TriggerTest/testAthenaTrigRDO.py > valgrind.log 2>&1

arg.argvalue: if [ -f trig_cost.root ] ; then RunTrigCostD3PD.exe -f trig_cost.root --outputTagFromAthena --monitorAllChainSeqAlg --monitorROI --monitorGlobals --monitorFullEvent --monitorROS ; else echo file trig_cost.root does not exist thus RunTrigCostD3PD.exe will not be run ; fi
